channel.title: Vulnerabilities on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Vulnerabilities on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein’s Yahoo Inbox Revealed
item.description: Plus: ICE deploys secretive phone surveillance tech, officials warn of Chinese surveillance tools in US highway infrastructure, and more.

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein’s Yahoo Inbox Revealed
item.description: Plus: ICE deploys secretive phone surveillance tech, officials warn of Chinese surveillance tools in US highway infrastructure, and more.

item.title: Apple’s Big Bet to Eliminate the iPhone’s Most Targeted Vulnerabilities
item.description: Alongside new iPhones, Apple released a new security architecture on Tuesday: Memory Integrity Enforcement aims to eliminate the most frequently exploited class of iOS bugs.

item.title: Apple’s Big Bet to Eliminate the iPhone’s Most Targeted Vulnerabilities
item.description: Alongside new iPhones, Apple released a new security architecture on Tuesday: Memory Integrity Enforcement aims to eliminate the most frequently exploited class of iOS bugs.

item.title: As hackers exploit one high-severity SAP flaw, company warns of 3 more
item.description: Users of SAP’s S/4HANA and NetWeaver products are at risk and should patch soon.

item.title: SAP warns of high-severity vulnerabilities in multiple products
item.description: Users of SAP’s S/4HANA and NetWeaver products are at risk and should patch soon.

item.title: 7 Best Password Managers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your logins locked down with our favorite password management apps for PC, Mac, Android, iPhone, and web browsers.

item.title: 7 Best Password Managers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your logins locked down with our favorite password management apps for PC, Mac, Android, iPhone, and web browsers.

item.title: High-severity vulnerability in Passwordstate credential manager. Patch now.
item.description: Vulnerability can be exploited to gain access to customers’ crown jewels.

item.title: A Single Poisoned Document Could Leak ‘Secret’ Data Via ChatGPT
item.description: Security researchers found a weakness in OpenAI’s Connectors, which let you hook up ChatGPT to other services, that allowed them to extract data from a Google Drive without any user interaction.

item.title: A Single Poisoned Document Could Leak ‘Secret’ Data Via ChatGPT
item.description: Security researchers found a weakness in OpenAI’s Connectors, which let you hook up ChatGPT to other services, that allowed them to extract data from a Google Drive without any user interaction.

item.title: I Watched AI Agents Try to Hack My Vibe-Coded Websit
item.description: RunSybil, a startup founded by OpenAI’s first security researcher, deploys agents that probe websites for vulnerabilities—part of a new AI era for cybersecurity.

item.title: I Watched AI Agents Try to Hack My Vibe-Coded Websit
item.description: RunSybil, a startup founded by OpenAI’s first security researcher, deploys agents that probe websites for vulnerabilities—part of a new AI era for cybersecurity.

item.title: Microsoft Put Older Versions of SharePoint on Life Support. Hackers Are Taking Advantage
item.description: Multiple hacking groups—including state actors from China—have targeted a vulnerability in older, on-premises versions of the file-sharing tool after a flawed attempt to patch it.

item.title: Microsoft Put Older Versions of SharePoint on Life Support. Hackers Are Taking Advantage
item.description: Multiple hacking groups—including state actors from China—have targeted a vulnerability in older, on-premises versions of the file-sharing tool after a flawed attempt to patch it.

item.title: What to know about ToolShell, the SharePoint threat under mass exploitation
item.description: Easy to exploit. Unauthenticated access. Massive reach. ToolShell has it all.

item.title: Google finds custom backdoor being installed on SonicWall network devices
item.description: Overstep backdoor nukes key log entries, making detection hard.
